law.history: Repealed 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 158, effective January 1, 2006. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 293, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 327, sec. 8, effective July 14, 2000. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 254, sec. 30, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 333, sec. 2, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 163, sec. 3, effective July 13, 1990; and ch. 437, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 3, effective August 1, 1986. -- Amended 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 186, Art. I, sec. 34, effective June 16, 1960. -- Amended 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 2. -- Amended 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 8. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 4019a-10, 4088.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: List of resident bondholders -- Information to be furnished to Department of Revenue.
